reviewText: Terrific material, but not very good documentary.  This film feels like it was put together quickly, without a lot of insight into the fascinating story of Music Hall Days.  Hope someone will try again.

I thought that there was a nice forward narrative.  There were many images.  There was some video footage and a considerable number of audio excerpts.  I thought that this was a nicely done video.  I am not an expert on the history of the British Music Hall but I felt that this video was a credible introduction to this era of British entertainment
